tasks.task: Gardening care and maintenance for diplodinias and mandevillas.
subtasks: Discussing the care requirements of diplodinias and mandevillas, including hardiness zones and sunlight preferences.

Addressing repotting needs and challenges, particularly with mandevilla vines.
Explaining propagation methods for both plants, including stem cuttings and layering.
Mentioning common pests and disease resistance, as well as troubleshooting for leaf drop and yellowing.
Discussing overwintering techniques for indoor plants, including cold protection and watering schedules.
